recipesJson.name: Strawberry Shortcake
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
CAP Vanilla Cupcake is a really good cake on its own. At 4% you get a nice fluffy white cake with a little bit of vanilla frosting. I’ve added the TFA Vanilla Custard II to add to the depth and make it a little darker. 


CAP Sweet Strawberry is so good. It’s a nice in between artificial and natural strawberry. CAP Vanilla Whipped cream for a nice fluffy cream on top. And a little bit of CAP Sugar Cookie to make the cake a little drier. 

Watch the Video Here: https://youtu.be/4WploIH0Ti8

reviews.text:
The aroma alone was amazing, and made it extremely difficult to let it steep.  I just couldn't wait to try it!
So after just an overnight steep, I'm already loving it.  It's floury and biscuit-like with just the right amount of sweetness, and the strawberry compliments it nicely without being overpowering.  I'll definitely be making more of this in the future!
